casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Henry Clifford BYRD, Sr. No. 301P01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Henry C. Byrd, Sr., Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 26th day of November 2003 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the Order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2004."
